description:
Sixth-graders Kousuke and Natsume grew up in the same apartment building as childhood friends. During summer break, while playing in the apartment building that is set to be demolished, they find themselves caught in a strange phenomenon. All they can see around them is a vast sea. Will Kousuke and the others make it back to their world? A journey of farewells in summer has just begun.

(Source: Netflix)
hashtag: #雨を告げる漂流団地 #漂流団地 #DriftingHome
synonyms: บ้านล่องลอย

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Coastal
tags.description: Story prominently takes place near the beach or around a coastal area/town. Setting is near the ocean.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Ghost
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a ghost.

tags.name: Survival
tags.description: Centers around the struggle to live in spite of extreme obstacles.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Football
tags.description: Centers around the sport of football (known in the USA as "soccer").

tags.name: Photography
tags.description: Centers around the use of cameras to capture photos.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tete_hiroyasu) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/ishidahiroyasutete) 

Former student of Kyoto Seika University, currently employed at Studio Colorido.

He gained notoriety on the internet during his university years thanks to the short "Fumiko no Kokuhaku," a two-minute-long animation released in 2009 (when he was only 21) and produced entirely by himself. The short attracted attention internationally and won him the Japanese YouTube Video Award. He graduated in 2011 with the project "Rain Town."

He has won several awards as a young and emergent artist, his work has been featured in the Newtype magazine and praised by the likes of [Mamoru Hosoda](https://anilist.co/staff/100067/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tete_hiroyasu) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/ishidahiroyasutete) 

Former student of Kyoto Seika University, currently employed at Studio Colorido.

He gained notoriety on the internet during his university years thanks to the short "Fumiko no Kokuhaku," a two-minute-long animation released in 2009 (when he was only 21) and produced entirely by himself. The short attracted attention internationally and won him the Japanese YouTube Video Award. He graduated in 2011 with the project "Rain Town."

He has won several awards as a young and emergent artist, his work has been featured in the Newtype magazine and praised by the likes of [Mamoru Hosoda](https://anilist.co/staff/100067/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/42231474)

The founder and representative director of [Twin Engine](https://anilist.co/studio/6199/). Originally a producer for [Fuji TV](https://anilist.co/studio/169/), where he produced numerous anime for the Noitamina programming block.

__[Website](https://zutomayo.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/zutomayo_staff) | [Instagram (run by ACA-NE)](https://www.instagram.com/zutomayo/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCv6P5nsS9rP4tDtFlqLU_QQ) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/38WbKH6oKAZskBhqDFA8Uj?si=5bjHWeOJTmKT7BgIOkRdJA)__

__Introduction:__
Zutto Mayonaka de Iinoni, better known by their international name Zutomayo (stylized as ZUTOMAYO), is a Japanese rock band under record label EMI Records Japan, affiliated with Watanabe Entertainment. 

The group is quite secretive by nature, seeing as they have never released a full member list, with each work crediting different people for their music production, lyrics, composition and arrangement. The only reoccurring member is the vocalist, who is only known as an unindentified woman going by the stage name "ACA-NE" (pronounced Akane). It can additionally be noted that their secrecy is a contributing factor to their popularity.

__Biography:__
Zutomayo debuted by releasing their first song "Byoushin wo Kamu" on YouTube on June 4, 2018. The song became an immediate hit on release, garnering 200,000 views within its first week on the platform. Additionally, after releasing the single through streaming platforms on August 30, the song became the most streamed song that week. Following their song's release, Zutomayo held their first concert at the Daikanyama Loop in Tokyo. Attendees were handed opaque glasses and reported that the entire venue was dark for the duration of the concert. The group would continue to conceal their identities in future concerts as well.

Zutomayo released two more singles digitally before releasing their first EP, Tadashii Itsuwari Kara no Kishou, on November 14 in the same year, through record label EMI Records Japan. The EP peaked 8th on the Oricon Albums Chart and was nominated in the 19th CD Shop Awards. On June 5, 2019, a second EP was released titled Imawa Imade Chikaiwa Emide, which peaked at the number one spot on the Oricon chart. Later in that same year on October 30, they would release their first full-length album titled Hisohiso Banashi.

__Members:__
- [ACA-NE](https://anilist.co/staff/170316/ACANE) (ACAね, Akane) – vocalist, in-charge of lyrics and composition

(Source: [Wikipedia (JP)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%9A%E3%81%A3%E3%81%A8%E7%9C%9F%E5%A4%9C%E4%B8%AD%E3%81%A7%E3%81%84%E3%81%84%E3%81%AE%E3%81%AB%E3%80%82), edited)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/zutomayo)

ACA-NE, alternatively pronounced as Akane, is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer and member of the rock band [Zutomayo](https://anilist.co/staff/170315/ZUTOMAYO).

__[Website](https://zutomayo.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/zutomayo_staff) | [Instagram (run by ACA-NE)](https://www.instagram.com/zutomayo/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCv6P5nsS9rP4tDtFlqLU_QQ) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/38WbKH6oKAZskBhqDFA8Uj?si=5bjHWeOJTmKT7BgIOkRdJA)__

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/zutomayo)

ACA-NE, alternatively pronounced as Akane, is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer and member of the rock band [Zutomayo](https://anilist.co/staff/170315/ZUTOMAYO).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/100outo) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZAgssIVgZSOv8UxjRd2knQ)

100kaiOuto is a Japanese lyricist, composer, arranger and music producer.

__[Website](https://zutomayo.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/zutomayo_staff) | [Instagram (run by ACA-NE)](https://www.instagram.com/zutomayo/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCv6P5nsS9rP4tDtFlqLU_QQ) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/38WbKH6oKAZskBhqDFA8Uj?si=5bjHWeOJTmKT7BgIOkRdJA)__

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/cashisuorennji) | [Tumblr](https://ichijiku2023.tumblr.com/)

Affiliated with Studio Colorido, formerly affiliated with MADHOUSE.

_Not to be confused with the Hikari no Sono Animation affiliated animator [Jie Huang](https://anilist.co/staff/336327/Jie-Huang)_

title.native: 泣きたい私は猫をかぶる
ペンギン・ハイウェイ
宇宙ショーへようこそ

ブレイブ・ストーリー
